it.polito.verifoo.random

Class RandomGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.verifoo.random.RandomGraph

  • public class RandomGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates a random service graph for Verifoo with random requirements and set of policies

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomGraph(java.util.Random random, int maxClients, int maxServers, int maxInternalNodes, int maxProperty)
      Creates a totally random generated graph for Verifoo

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomGraph

        public RandomGraph(java.util.Random random,
                   int maxClients,
                   int maxServers,
                   int maxInternalNodes,
                   int maxProperty)
        Creates a totally random generated graph for Verifoo
        Parameters:
        random - a random number generator
        maxClients - max number of clients in the service graph
        maxServers - max number of servers in the service graph
        maxInternalNodes - max number of internal nodes in the service graph
        maxProperty - max number of property that will be checked

    • Method Detail
